snippet: Vijay Singh filed suit in New York’s state supreme court, charging the PGA Tour with “violating its duty of care and good faith” in suspending the golfer for his use of deer antler spray.
lead_paragraph: Vijay Singh filed suit in New York’s state supreme court, charging the PGA Tour with “violating its duty of care and good faith” in suspending the golfer for his use of deer antler spray.
